Package access_control.epcis.filter

EPCIS Repository - Access control filters.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Filter This class applies the access filters.
FilterHelper This class contains methods that help the access_control.Filter class The methods concerning the Mask or Transformation are not developed
 

Package access_control.epcis.filter Description

EPCIS Repository - Access control filters.

TODO list:

  1. Move accesscontrol.dao and accesscontrol.entities in project epcis-repository-acl to external library (jar)
  2. Check if code for QueryOperationsWebService.poll(Poll) is well written (possible security flaws)
  3. Implement management of groups (in addition to partners)
  4. Make an abstract Filter class with several implementations: SQL-based (the Rabia way), XACML-based (discuss with GreyC for this), or other alternatives (LDAP, etc) and use a properties file to select which implementation to use (see sample way to do this in com.orange.api.epcis.subscriber.receiver).
